title: >>> A New CONTENDER
body_text:
At DODGEBALL 45, the third inter-gender captains battle will take place.
News of Kevin Adams's decision to step down came in the latter part of this past week, informing John that his only reason for wanting to be captain was to simply face, and defeat one Lenny Herrera. It is obviously a decision that has given another person a huge opportunity for a crack at some gold.
Wesley will have his hands full at 45 when he goes one-on-one with the player who has attended the second most number of events [behind John Tronolone], missing only DODGEBALL 20 and DODGEBALL TWENTY-SIX. Her name is Diana DiBuccio.
As always, card is subject to change.
But for now, expect a wild evening when Wesley Hebrew defends against his new challenger, Diana DiBuccio.
> DODGEBALL 46: Champion vs. Sara DeCuir
> DODGEBALL 47: Challenger Needed!
> DODGEBALL 48: Challenger Needed!
> DODGEBALL 49: Champion vs. John Tronolone
DODGEBALL 50
The date for DODGEBALL 50 has changed. It was originally scheduled to take place on Saturday, July 30th. The date however will be pushed back one week as huge plans are still being drawn out for undeniably the biggest event ever. The date is now Friday, August 4th. There is no question that DODGEBALL 50 will emanate from Ocean Road Park, the place where it all began. Start time will however be a little later than most ORP events at an UNofficial time of 5pm.
body_html:
At DODGEBALL 45, the third inter-gender captains battle will take place.

News of Kevin Adams's decision to step down came in the latter part of this past week, informing John that his only reason for wanting to be captain was to simply face, and defeat one Lenny Herrera. It is obviously a decision that has given another person a huge opportunity for a crack at some gold.

Wesley will have his hands full at 45 when he goes one-on-one with the player who has attended the second most number of events [behind John Tronolone], missing only DODGEBALL 20 and DODGEBALL TWENTY-SIX. Her name is Diana DiBuccio.

As always, card is subject to change.

But for now, expect a wild evening when Wesley Hebrew defends against his new challenger, Diana DiBuccio.

> DODGEBALL 46: Champion vs. Sara DeCuir
> DODGEBALL 47: Challenger Needed!
> DODGEBALL 48: Challenger Needed!
> DODGEBALL 49: Champion vs. John Tronolone

DODGEBALL 50

The date for DODGEBALL 50 has changed. It was originally scheduled to take place on Saturday, July 30th. The date however will be pushed back one week as huge plans are still being drawn out for undeniably the biggest event ever. The date is now Friday, August 4th. There is no question that DODGEBALL 50 will emanate from Ocean Road Park, the place where it all began. Start time will however be a little later than most ORP events at an UNofficial time of 5pm.
